metadata.author: Claude + Phoenix Loumen
metadata.purpose: Prompts Stable Diffusion pour créatures temporelles

base_style: fantasy art, highly detailed, magical creature, glowing effects, ethereal, mystical atmosphere, professional TCG art style, centered composition
negative_prompt: low quality, blurry, distorted, ugly, bad anatomy, extra limbs, text, watermark, signature, frame, border

creatures.name: Luciole des Souvenirs

prompts.main: ethereal golden firefly, crystalline wings with memory fragments, glowing particles trailing behind, nostalgic aura, floating in ancient garden ruins, soft golden light, translucent body showing past memories, delicate and magical
prompts.alternative_1: quantum firefly spirit, wings made of golden light threads, hovering over forgotten flowers, emanating warm memories, semi-transparent with visible past echoes inside, dreamy atmosphere
prompts.alternative_2: luminescent memory wisp in firefly form, golden crystalline structure, trailing stardust of forgotten moments, gentle glow illuminating old garden stones, mystical and melancholic

creatures.art_style: soft watercolor effects, dreamy lighting, nostalgic color palette

creatures.name: Whiskers l'Intemporel

prompts.main: quantum cat existing in multiple states, flickering between solid and translucent, purple and cyan energy waves, superposition effect with multiple overlapping forms, mysterious glowing eyes, cosmic fur pattern
prompts.alternative_1: schrodinger's cat with reality distortion, half alive half spectral, quantum particles swirling around, multiple timeline versions visible simultaneously, enigmatic expression
prompts.alternative_2: interdimensional feline, body phasing between realities, quantum probability clouds, eyes showing different timelines, ethereal whiskers sensing parallel worlds

creatures.art_style: glitch art elements, quantum visualization, surreal physics

creatures.name: Sir Galahad l'Éternel

prompts.main: spectral knight frozen mid-charge, translucent silver armor with heroic engravings, eternal battle stance, glowing sword raised, time-frozen particles around him, noble and determined expression visible through ethereal helmet
prompts.alternative_1: ghostly paladin caught in temporal loop, shimmering plate armor, frozen in heroic moment, battle aura emanating courage, translucent form showing past glory
prompts.alternative_2: eternal warrior spirit, quantum armor reflecting multiple battles, suspended in time bubble, radiant with unbreakable will, heroic pose against invisible foes

creatures.art_style: epic heroic fantasy, dramatic lighting, metallic shine effects

creatures.name: Ignis le Prophétique

prompts.main: prophetic phoenix with future-sight flames, wings showing visions of tomorrow, rebirth fire in pink and gold, feathers made of temporal energy, majestic pose with head raised to future skies, trails of destiny
prompts.alternative_1: phoenix of future timelines, body composed of prophetic flames, wings spread showing possible futures, eternal rebirth glow, cosmic fire effects
prompts.alternative_2: transcendent firebird, future visions dancing in flames, quantum feathers shifting through time, eyes burning with tomorrow's wisdom, rising from probability ashes

creatures.art_style: vibrant flame effects, prophetic symbolism, dynamic composition

creatures.name: Cosmos l'Architecte du Destin

prompts.main: cosmic entity of pure probability, humanoid form made of swirling galaxies and mathematical equations, multiple arms weaving fate threads, reality distortion aura, transcendent being beyond time, purple and gold energy
prompts.alternative_1: nexus being at center of all timelines, crystalline body containing infinite possibilities, architect of destiny with cosmic tools, probability waves emanating
prompts.alternative_2: supreme temporal guardian, form shifting between dimensions, holding the threads of all possible futures, mathematical patterns in ethereal robes, omniscient presence

creatures.art_style: cosmic horror beauty, fractal patterns, reality-bending effects
